Zachariah or Zacharias__03.1__Jesus: Alias, Josue, the son of Josedec, the high priest of that time.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.7__I will give thee: Angels to attend and assist thee.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.8__Portending men: That is, men, who by words and actions are to foreshew wonders that are to come.-- Ibid.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.8__My servant the Orient: Christ, who according to his humanity is the servant of God, is called the Orient from his rising like the sun in the east to enlighten the world.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.9__The stone: Another emblem of Christ, the rock, foundation, and corner stone of his church.-- Ibid.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.9__Seven eyes: The manifold providence of Christ over his church, or the seven gifts of the spirit of God.-- Ibid.
Zachariah or Zacharias__03.9__One day: Viz., the day of the passion of Christ, the source of all our goodwhen this precious stone shall be graved, that is, cut and pierced, with whips, thorns, nails, and spear.
